name: Wonder Robot D
description:
In the Town of Woodsley, inventor Zuka Drake showcased his latest invention: The first artificial  lifeform, Wonder Robot D.

Wonder Robot D ("Robot" for short) has a talent to draw the latent potential of any item they find and wield magical abilities. A kettle will let Robot conjure steam, a box of matches will allow Robot to summon fire.

One morning a group Munks(monkey-like creatures) appear at the border of Woodsley...

ProjectWonder Robot  D lighthearted RPG in the tone of classic Final Fantasy, Breath of Fire and the Mario RPG series and Osamu Tezuka's Astroboy Manga. Featuring dozens of characters with a variety of fantastical designs and personalities.

  • Explore and collect items to boost Robot's repetoir of skills

  • Customise Robot's abilities items equipped.

  • Strategize and adapt your skillset to overcome the enemies

A demo containing the first act and ~1.5 hours of content will be available here from the 5th of April 2019. The full game Wonder Robot D is targetted to release later in 2019.
